title: Colab-Orange
description: To connect designers, developers and people with ideas.
descriptionPage: If you are a designer, developer or just have an idea and want to finish your project but don't know how to fix a bug, need help with the design or maybe you would like to help other people with their work, Colab Orange is the app where you can get or provide that help. Take a look at the website and start connecting with the Colab Orange community. Worked in a small team of 3 Developers and a Designer
features: Register by email and password or by gmail.
Create your profile with photo and description about you.
You can add links from social networks and your stack.
Fill out a form with the information about the project you would like to publish.
To collaborate with another work, fill out the form and send your help.
myTasks: Survey the team to agree on the css framework, the language of the commits and the schedule of the weekly meetings.
Creating tasks from the 'Issues' section in the GitHub repository.
Communication with the team to resolve questions about code, commands and git conflicts.

title: Task tracker (To-do list)
description: Add, edit and delete tasks. Each task will be saved in the localStorage, so they'll stay there if you refresh the page.
descriptionPage: You can create a list of tasks with their due date, edit them without worrying that they will be deleted when you refresh the page and delete each task when you complete them.
myTasks: Manage the state to save, create, delete and edit the task
features: Each task of the list will be save in the local Storage.
Add tasks to the list
You can edit each task
Delete the task
Add date to do the task

title: Fichap
description: 'Digital management and 100% cloud available for your work teams'
descriptionPage: An HR Services website. Freelance project developed for a small team of 3 Frontend Developers. Worked in a small team of 3 Developers
myTasks: Translate QA into actionable tasks for development.
features: You can select options that are presented in carousels
Once selected a plan need to fill forms to send your information
Animations on principal and accesory images

title: Marvel-Store/CMYK-sunset
description: A web application to buy marvel comics. You can enter with an email to buy it.
descriptionPage: Ecommerce to buy Marvel's comics. You can register with their email and password or with your gmail, find the comic you are looking for and take it in your cart!. Worked with a small team of 6 Developers
features: If you select a comic from Home, it is added to the cart
At the cart you can chooce how many comics you want
If don't want a comic you can delete it.
Fill the form with your name and orther information to make the purchase
You can register with your email and password or with gmail to complete the purchase

title: Survey Form
description: A Survey Form to know the custumer's opinion about the restaurant they have just visited.
descriptionPage: How many times would you have liked to help improve the restaurant where you just ate, with a form like this you can let the restaurant know what you liked and what you did not like.
myTasks: Create an HTML document with properly marked up content
Create the form with the corresponding tags
Create a file for the css
features: You can enter your personal data
Select one or more options to know your experience
You can type numbers or select a name from a list
Also, can leave a message to the restaurant

title: Skincare with Nature
description: Landing page about skincare, products, offers and news. FCC project.
descriptionPage: A freeCodeCamp project from 'Web Responsive Design' Lessons.
myTasks: Create an HTML document with properly marked up content
Create a file for the css
features: Navbar to link the sections of the page
Short video to know a bit of skin care
An input to write your email for subscription

title: Inmunology
description: Introduction to Inmunology in spanish. Concepts and principal definitions.
descriptionPage: An app to learn the principal concepts of this branch of biology that covers the study of immune systems. A freeCodeCamp project from 'Web Responsive Design' Lessons.
myTasks: Create an HTML document with properly marked up content
Create a file for the css
features: With the fixed sidebar navigate to each section of the page
Images and text to define the inmunology concepts

title: Juan Gabriel
description: Tribute Page. My first app developed in HTML, with freeCodeCamp from 'Web Responsive Design' Lessons.
descriptionPage: A small application to show information about an artist who's gone some time ago. I built it about my mom's favorite mexican singer, Juan Gabriel.
myTasks: Create an HTML document with properly marked up content
Create a file for the css
features: Links to know more about the singer
Using the img tag to add a singer's image
Text explaing who he was.
A footer to visit my profile in gitHub and codepen
